title: Monetary policy affects currency, net exports

content.question: When Country X’s central bank engages in monetary policy actions that lead to a decrease in interest rates, the international value of Country X’s currency and Country X’s exports and imports will most likely change in which of the following ways?

choices.label:
Value of the Currency
 Exports
 Imports

Increase
 Increase
 Increase

Value of the Currency
 Exports
 Imports

Increase
 Increase
 Decrease

Value of the Currency
 Exports
 Imports

Increase
 Decrease
 Decrease

Value of the Currency
 Exports
 Imports

Decrease
 Increase
 Decrease

Value of the Currency
 Exports
 Imports

Decrease
 Increase
 Increase

content.answer:
Value of the Currency
 Exports
 Imports

Decrease
 Increase
 Decrease

unit.text: 6: Open Economy - International Trade and Finance

topic.text: 6.5: Changes in the Foreign Exchange Market and Net Exports

skill.text: Skill 3.B: Determine the effect(s) of one or more changes on other economic markets.
